title: Balasore Student Death: Protest erupt in Balasore after college student dies by self-immolation over sexual harassment | Bhubaneswar News - Times of India
meta_description: Protests erupted in Odisha's Balasore after a college student died from self-immolation, allegedly due to sexual harassment and institutional neglect.
main_headings: Fury over Balasore student death: Massive protest erupts outside Odisha assembly; water cannons deployed
